articles.title: Sakshi Malik Criticises Asian Games' Trial Exemptions For Vinesh & Bajrang - The Quint
articles.description: Sakshi Malik Criticises Asian Games' Trial Exemptions For Vinesh & Bajrang
articles.content:
The other wrestlers are set to compete in selection trials on July 22 and 23 to secure their spots in the Indian squad and it has angered the rest of the wrestling community, including Sakshi.
